body:
Comment 3: 
Unfortunately it's easy to assume that everyone knows not to use spaces
in file names on windows, for any kind of development. It's a painful
lesson to learn!

It's probably not as much a problem for windows now as it was in the past
(command.com vs cmd.exe) but it's just better to avoid them because
there are tools that barf on them.

I agree, something prominent that discourages the foolhardy from attempting
to use the dastardly things.

-joe
